bioghist.p: The Board of Trustees of Villanova University is composed of between 20 and 30 members, at least nine of whom must be members in good standing of the Order of Saint Augustine of the Province of Saint Thomas of Villanova. The Board of Trustees has responsibility over all that pertains to the University. The President and Vice Presidents of the University serve at the discretion of the board.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of minutes, agendas, and memoranda of the Executive Committee and several other committees of the Board of Trustees of Villanova University. The collection includes minutes of the Executive Committee (1987-2006); the Development and Public Relations Committee (1974, 1986); the Investment Committee and Investments and Endowments Committees (1971-1973, 1983-1989); the Student Affairs Committee (1971, 1974); and the Student Life Committee (1994-1995). The collection also includes quarterly investment reports (1983-1989), monthly investment reports (1986-1987), and several financial presentations.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
